price: Sigurisht që ai (djalli) ka shpënë në humbje një mizëri prej jush; vallë a nuk po mendoni?!
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَضَلَّ مِنكُمۡ جِبِلّٗا كَثِيرًاۖ أَفَلَمۡ تَكُونُواْ تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: walaqad aḍalla minkum jibillan kathīran afalam takūnū taʿqilūna
